USEFRAME_DESCRIPTION: This command will apply a selected Frame to a card of choice. You can buy Frames by using the "{{prefix}}frameshop" command
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
CANNOT_APPLY: {{author}} You cannot apply a **Frame** to a **3D** card
NO_GIF: {{author}} You cannot apply a **Frame** to a **GIF** card
NO_FRAMES_FOUND: {{author}} That **Frame** code is either invalid or not in your inventory
UF_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{frameName}}** **Frame** to this card?
EMBED_FOOTER: Confirming this process will destroy the currently applied Frame
NO_OWNER: {{author}} The card is no longer in your collection
UF_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{frameName}}** **Frame** to your card
